msg: Make cgi-bin work as a regular directory when using mod_vhost_alias

author: gstein
msg: Apply a patch from John Vasta for adding (some/more) DeltaV support to
mod_dav. The patch applied and compiled cleanly, so I'm committing. Any
necessary changes from a review will come later, so that we can easily track
what needed to change (and can be back-ported to mod_dav 1.1).

author: wrowe
msg: This is a further aspect of the Win9x problem with cgi scripts, some
interpreters are choking on slash delimited scripts, so transpose all
slash delimited commands to backslash path delimiters.

author: wrowe
msg: This is definately -part- of the win9x issues, we want a bit more
control over CreateProcess than trying to spawn a batch file, so
we wrap it in the ComSpec.  Tested, and it the process is created
